verbose_text: Ang II can promote cardiomyocyte hypertrophy and growth and proliferation of fibroblasts, and also promotes the synthesis and accumulation of collagen, but studies show these biological activity functions of Ang II are primarily mediated by its receptor, AT1R [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR].
evidence: Ang II can promote cardiomyocyte hypertrophy and growth and proliferation of fibroblasts, and also promotes the synthesis and accumulation of collagen
